Name: Jack Rising
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions:
Spritz a chilled glass with Islay whisky (Kaiko used Laphroaig) and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into spritzed glass. Special ingredient #1 : Rejuvenated grenadine
* Rejuvenated grenadine
300g pomegranate juice
150g granulated sugar
30g maraska syrup (from jar of maraschino cherries)
60g beet vinegar (from jar of pickled beetroot)
60g oxidised grenache red wine
1 barspoon rosewater
¼ vanilla pod
4 pinch ground allspice (~1g)
6g carob molasses
Place all ingredients in a jar and shake until the sugar is dissolved. Remove the vanilla pod after approx 1hr. Special ingredient #2 : Citric lime oleo-saccharum
100ml 1:1 lime oleo
10ml 10% citric acid solution
History: Created in 2016 by Kaiko Tulloch at Lucky Liquor Co., Edinburgh for Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Calling competition.
Nutrition: One serving of Jack Rising contains 116 calories
